channel.title: Installation and Deployment on Aspose.Cells Product Family
channel.description: Recent content in Installation and Deployment on Aspose.Cells Product Family

item.title: System Requirements
item.description: The Aspose.Cells for .NET components do not require Microsoft Excel to be installed either on the client or on the server side. Contents Summary 1 Supported Operating Systems 1.1 Windows 1.2 Linux 1.3 Mac 2 .NET Framework versions supported 2.1 .NET Frameworks 2.2 Mono Framework 3 Development Environments 4 Aspose.Cells Grid Suite System Requirements 4.1 Aspose.Cells.GridDesktop 4.1.1 .NET Framework 4.1.2 Development Tools 4.1.3 Operating System 4.2 Aspose.Cells.GridWeb 4.

item.title: Installation
item.description: Contents Summary 1 Install Aspose.Cells for .NET through NuGet 1.1 Install Aspose.Cells using Package Manager GUI 1.2 Install Aspose.Cells using the Package Manager Console 2 Referencing Aspose.Cells from a .NET Project 2.1 Referencing the component from a VS.NET 2010 Client Profile project 3 Referencing Aspose.Cells Grid Controls from a .NET project 4 Uninstalling Aspose.Cells for .NET || \ Install Aspose.
